metadata.title: Monadic Chat Apps - Tools Inventory
metadata.description: Comprehensive inventory of shared tool groups and custom tools across all Monadic Chat applications

file_operations.description: Read, write, and list files in the shared folder

tools.name: read_file_from_shared_folder
tools.description: Read a file from shared folder and return its content with metadata

tools.name: write_file_to_shared_folder
tools.description: Write or append content to a file (supports Unicode and subdirectories)

tools.name: list_files_in_shared_folder
tools.description: List all files and directories in a folder or subdirectory

python_execution.description: Execute Python, Ruby, Shell, and other code

tools.name: run_code
tools.description: Execute program code and return the output

tools.name: run_bash_command
tools.description: Execute a bash command in the Python container

tools.name: check_environment
tools.description: Check the Python container environment

tools.name: lib_installer
tools.description: Install a library using package manager (pip, uv, or apt)

file_reading.description: Read text from various file types

tools.name: fetch_text_from_file
tools.description: Read text content from files (txt, code, data files, etc.)

tools.name: fetch_text_from_pdf
tools.description: Extract text content from a PDF file with full-page support

tools.name: fetch_text_from_office
tools.description: Extract text from Office files (docx, xlsx, pptx)

web_search_tools.description: Search the web and fetch content from URLs

tools.name: search_web
tools.description: Search the web using provider-appropriate search method

tools.name: fetch_web_content
tools.description: Fetch content from a URL and save to shared folder

tools.name: tavily_search
tools.description: Perform a Tavily web search and return summarized results

tools.name: tavily_fetch
tools.description: Fetch the full content of a URL using Tavily API

web_automation.description: Capture and interact with web pages using Selenium

tools.name: capture_viewport_screenshots
tools.description: Capture a web page as multiple viewport-sized screenshots

tools.name: list_captured_screenshots
tools.description: List all screenshots captured in current session

tools.name: get_viewport_presets
tools.description: Get available viewport preset dimensions

tools.name: capture_webpage_text
tools.description: Extract text content from a web page in Markdown format

tools.name: debug_application
tools.description: Debug a generated web application using Selenium

content_analysis_openai.description: Analyze video, image, and audio content using OpenAI's multimodal capabilities

tools.name: analyze_video
tools.description: Analyze video content and generate description

tools.name: analyze_image
tools.description: Analyze and describe image contents using OpenAI vision

tools.name: analyze_audio
tools.description: Analyze and transcribe audio using OpenAI's Whisper

jupyter_operations.description: Create, manage, and execute Jupyter notebooks

app_creation.description: List and create Monadic Chat applications

tools.name: list_monadic_apps
tools.description: List all available Monadic Chat applications

tools.name: get_app_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific app

tools.name: create_simple_app_template
tools.description: Create a basic app template file

custom_tools.name: generate_additional_file
custom_tools.description: Generate additional files for CLI projects

openai.name: openai_code_agent
openai.description: Delegate complex Python coding tasks to OpenAI Code

grok.name: grok_code_agent
grok.description: Call Grok-Code-Fast-1 agent for complex Python code generation tasks

openai.name: openai_code_agent
openai.description: Delegate complex notebook coding tasks to OpenAI Code

gemini.name: create_and_populate_jupyter_notebook
gemini.description: Create a new Jupyter notebook AND add cells in one operation

grok.name: create_and_populate_jupyter_notebook
grok.description: Create a new Jupyter notebook AND add cells in one operation

grok.name: grok_code_agent
grok.description: Call Grok-Code-Fast-1 agent for complex notebook code generation

openai.name: request_tool
openai.description: Request access to a locked tool by name

openai.description: Delegate code generation tasks to OpenAI Code

grok.description: Request access to a locked tool by name
